name: CrawlChat
description: CrawlChat transforms documentation and knowledge sources into AI chatbots for efficient customer support and engagement across websites, Discord, and Slack.
longDescription: CrawlChat is an AI-first support system that converts existing documentation, guides, and FAQs into intelligent chatbots to provide instant answers to users. Its mission is to streamline customer support by reducing the volume of support tickets through self-service options, enabling businesses to offer 24/7 assistance without constant human intervention. The platform integrates seamlessly with websites, Discord, and Slack, allowing users to query knowledge bases directly within their preferred environments. By analyzing performance and identifying data gaps, CrawlChat helps improve documentation quality over time. It serves developers, product teams, and customer support staff by automating routine inquiries and escalating complex issues to human agents when necessary. Overall, it solves the problem of inefficient support by making knowledge accessible and interactive via AI.
features: Knowledge Base Creation allows users to build a comprehensive database by scraping online documentation or uploading files, enabling the AI to draw from accurate sources for responses.
Chatbot Integration connects the AI to websites, Discord, or Slack, providing seamless access to support within users' daily tools and enhancing engagement.
Performance Analysis offers insights into messages, conversations, and scores, helping identify and fill knowledge gaps to improve overall documentation effectiveness.
Support Ticket System escalates unresolved queries from the chatbot to human support, ensuring complex issues are handled efficiently while minimizing manual workload.
Chat Widget embeds a customizable interface on websites for one-click access to answers, including features like code blocks, pinning, and sharing for better user experience.
Instant Answers deliver immediate responses to questions based on docs and FAQs, reducing wait times and empowering users with self-service capabilities.
24/7 Availability ensures the chatbot is always online, handling inquiries at any time and cutting down on off-hour support tickets.
Analytics Dashboard provides charts on daily messages and score distributions, giving visibility into community engagement and documentation usage.
Discord and Slack Bots allow tagging the bot for quick answers from knowledge bases, integrating support directly into team communication channels.
Customization Options let users tailor the chat widget's appearance, tone, and prompts, aligning AI responses with brand identity and specific support needs.

faqs.question: What is CrawlChat?
faqs.answer: CrawlChat is an AI-powered platform that turns your documentation and knowledge sources into chatbots for customer support. It integrates with websites, Discord, and Slack to provide instant answers and reduce support tickets.

faqs.question: How does CrawlChat work?
faqs.answer: It crawls or uploads your documentation to create a knowledge base, then uses AI to answer user queries in real-time via chat interfaces. Unresolved questions can escalate to a ticket system for human review.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, CrawlChat offers a free plan for personal use with limited features. Paid plans like Starter and Pro provide enhanced capabilities for businesses.

faqs.question: What integrations does CrawlChat support?
faqs.answer: CrawlChat integrates with websites via a chat widget, as well as Discord and Slack bots for seamless support within those platforms.

faqs.question: Can I customize the chatbot?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize the chat widget's look, tone, and prompts to match your brand and specific support requirements.

faqs.question: How do I create a knowledge base?
faqs.answer: Simply add URLs for online documentation to scrape or upload files directly, and the AI will use them to generate responses.

faqs.question: What AI models does CrawlChat use?
faqs.answer: It utilizes base, smart, and reasoning AI models, with advanced options available on higher-tier plans for better performance.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with CrawlChat?
faqs.answer: CrawlChat prioritizes data security, ensuring knowledge bases and user interactions are handled privately and compliantly.

faqs.question: What are the pricing options?
faqs.answer: Plans include Free at $0/month, Starter at $45/month, and Pro at $99/month, each with increasing features like more AI models and integrations.

faqs.question: How can CrawlChat reduce support tickets?
faqs.answer: By providing instant AI-driven answers from your docs, it enables self-service, resolving many queries without human involvement and escalating only complex ones.
